casebody.data:
DUKE ENERGY CAROLINAS, LLC
v.
GRAY, et al. No. 108PA14-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 18, 2015. Debbie W. Harden, Meredith J. McKee, Charlotte, for Duke Energy Carolinas, LLC. Jackson R. Price, Charlotte. John R. Buric, Preston O. Odom, III, Charlotte, for Gray, Herbert A. Fred W. DeVore, III, Charlotte, for Builder Support Services of the Carolinas, Inc., et al. Derek P. Adler, Charlotte. Erik M. Rosenwood, for Yarbrough-Williams & Houle, Inc. Mark R. Kutny, Charlotte. Lawrence J. Goldman, Charlotte, for Lucas-Forman, Inc. Gregory W. Brown, Raleigh, for Carter Land Surveyors & Planners, Inc. Kristi L. Gavalier, Raleigh. Matthew D. Rhoad, Davis F. Roach, Raleigh, for Piedmont Natural Gas Company, Inc., et al. Joseph W. Eason, Raleigh, D. Martin Wart, for N.C. Electric Membership Corporation, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 17th of June 2015 by Plaintiff-Appellant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of June 2015."

Plaintiff-Appellant shall have up to and including the 20th day of July 2015 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
